DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine proportion of patients presented a search allelic imbalance of expression of genes BRCA 1 and 2 in population with hereditary breast and/or ovarian cancer risk and negative for deletion mutation BRCA 1 and 2 genes
DOC.brief_title: Search Allelic Imbalance of Expression of BRCA Genes in Hereditary Risk of Breast and/or Ovarian Cancer
DOC.mesh_term: Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer Syndrome
